sect3.title: Packages Module Examples
sect3.para: The Packages Module controls the Software Repository. There are no actions with XML input or output. Format of the outpu data of actions that produce output is described in .

Optionally, the desc flag can be used to print out human-readable package descriptions. Furthermore, the binary, data, module, source and task flags can be used to filter package types. Setting no filtering flags has the same effect as if all flags were present.
